title: Webquest – I’m Drinking What?
content:
Just like the population of Earth, the space station crew has access to limited resources, one of which is drinking water. Did you know that water on the International Space Station is filtered and reused? The filtration process includes respiration, sweat, and, yes, even urine. Why? Check out the Water Filtration STEMonstration.
